summary: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
cast: Julianne Moore|Michael Angarano|Greg Kinnear|Lily Collins|Nathan Lane|Norbert Leo Butz|Jessica Hecht|Charlie Saxton|Nikki Blonsky|Fiona Shaw|Sophie Lane Curtis|Brynn Casey|Katie Meinholt|Anthony Ippolito|John Hodgman|Remy Auberjonois|Jim Breuer|Poonam Basu|Alexander Flores|Alan Aisenberg|Erin Wilhelmi|Marcia DeBonis|Donnetta Lavinia Grays|Peter Kim|Kevin Hoffman|Alan Fox|Marlee Roberts|Frank Moschetto|Sasha Almedia-Beers|Olivia Salerno|Oscar Salerno|John Cerny|Scott Friend|Katie Gell|Colin Holmes|Kenneth Kopolovicz|Alex Montaldo|Alex Ursino|Gerritt Vandermeer|Nicole Wilson|George Winters
title: Miss Sinclair
